item.title: We mean business
item.description:
We mean business

Ambassadors of Style is an entrepreneurship, technology and science innovation program that advances economic development in underprivileged areas through people development, workforce development and business acceleration.

item.title: Pantone launches new vibrant app for digital-savvy designers and colour enthusiasts
item.description:
Pantone launches new vibrant app for digital-savvy designers and colour enthusiasts

Pantone has launched a brand new, colourful iOS app as part of the company's ambitious push into digital in order to reach out to younger, tech-savvy digital designers.

item.title: Going Vertical with Engineering Software
item.description:
Going Vertical with Engineering Software

n the beginning, AutoCAD was the same. Whether you used it for architecture, industrial design, mechanical design or electrical design, you used the same 2D drafting and drawing features. Working with a product built for the widest possible horizontal, you learned to come up with creative solutions (or clumsy workarounds) to accomplish the tasks unique to your discipline, domain or niche.

item.title: How these LA startup giants hired their game-changing developers
item.description:

item.title: Teachers learn about the value of video games in the classroom
item.description:
Teachers learn about the value of video games in the classroom

TROY >> Many educators throughout the Capital Region were invited to the 10th Annual Games in Education symposium, which took place at Troy Middle School this year. The Games in Education Symposium event is a multi-day event, which focuses on the topic of using video games to supplement and inspire in-classroom education.

item.title: Snapchat geofilters could become the new hashtag
item.description:
Snapchat geofilters could become the new hashtag

The tailored graphic frames for smartphone photos on Snapchat are popping up at summer weddings, family reunions and birthday parties. Brands like McDonald's and Starbucks are using them at concerts and sporting events.

item.title: Summer camp sessions help boost kids' use of science, technology, engineering and math programs
item.description:
Summer camp sessions help boost kids' use of science, technology, engineering and math programs

Using basic knowledge of circuits, her 9- to 12-year-olds were able to create and program musical bananas, paper remote controllers and even a workable dancing stage, where kids can sharpen their footwork by dancing to scrolling arrows on a screen that translate onto the dance pad.

item.title: How Samsung plans its phones
item.description:
How Samsung plans its phones

The S7 and S7 Edge have lots in common with the 6 from last year, whereas the S6 was a really big change from the 5. So first of all, could you tell me about why Samsung made such a big design change from the S5 to S6?

item.title: Office Cribs: 6 LA tech offices that'll give you office envy
